name: Capers
description: Capers is a mostly indica strain believed to have descended from the Burmese Kush genetic line. Pain and insomnia are crushed under the weight of this indica's relaxing effects, making this powerhouse indica a perfect choice for late night consumption. Its THC content typically falls around 15% with other cannabinoids occuring in trace amounts.
attributes_title: Sleepy, Happy, Hungry, Relaxed, Uplifted, Muscle Spasms, Insomnia, Nausea, Pain, Lack of Appetite, Dry Mouth
